SEO_TITLE: Asancus Legal - Tax, Civil and Commercial Law Firm
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Legal and international advice specialized in tax, civil and commercial law. Our firm is distinguished by its proximity and ability to solve complex cases efficiently.
OG_DESCRIPTION: We provide legal and international advice. Specialized in tax, civil and commercial law.
HERO_TITLE: Boutique law firm specializing in corporate law, focusing mainly on commercial and tax matters.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Made up of professionals with extensive experience in the business sector and broad knowledge of civil, commercial, and tax law, they have more than 15 years of practice and experience advising companies in different areas of business life.
HERO_PARAGRAPH: Professionalism and excellence are the foundations of this professional firm, which designs each project to suit the client's needs.

INFO_TITLE.title: In mythology, Sancus, GOD of loyalty and justice, protected the integrity of covenants and the enforcement of laws.
INFO_TITLE.subtitle: At Asancus Legal, we follow his legacy with an unwavering commitment: to defend your interests with strategy, ethics and legal precision.

INFO_SUBTITLE: Asancus Legal: Justice that protects, Loyalty that endures.

SOLUTIONS_PARAGRAPH.title: Ligtning soluciones legales estratégicas y personalizadas para empresas y particulares. Nuestro equipo de expertos está comprometido en defender sus derechos con profesionalismo y ética.
SOLUTIONS_PARAGRAPH.subtitle: Nos especializamos en derecho mercantil y fiscal, ofreciendo un enfoque integral para garantizar la mejor defensa y asesoría jurídica.

title: LEGAL ASSISTANCE IN THE DRAFTING OF CIVIL CONTRACTS
CIVIL CONFLICTS
description: Legal advice on drafting all types of civil contracts and agreements. Focused on the leasing of premises, purchase agreements, loans, and deposits.
Focused on advice and assistance in court in civil disputes involving claims for payment, damages, and contractual and non-contractual breaches.

title: LEGAL ASSISTANCE IN THE DRAFTING OF COMMERCIAL CONTRACTS
Industrial property protection
Corporate restructuring
CORPORATE DISPUTES
description: Legal advice on drafting all types of commercial contracts and agreements, both nationally and internationally. Focused on industrial leasing, purchase and sale agreements, brokerage, licensing, distribution, agency, and supply agreements.

Dedicated to the protection of trademark rights, designs, patents, and utility models focused on the company, as well as the negotiation and signing of agreements for the protection and licensing of rights at the national, EU, and international levels.
Advising partners on current or imminent insolvency proceedings, as well as on the negotiation of out-of-court settlements and the defense of debt claims and foreclosures.

Focused on providing legal advice to entrepreneurs, partners, and company administrators in decision-making, both in the Board of Directors and in the General Meeting, as well as in day-to-day operations for the preparation and signing of shareholder agreements or agreements between third parties. Defense in the challenge of corporate agreements, protection of trademarks, designs, acts of unfair competition, negotiating and resolving disputes between partners and administrators.

SEO_SERVICES_CIVIL_TITLE: Legal Advice in Civil Law | Asancus Legal
SEO_SERVICES_CIVIL_DESCRIPTION: Lawyers specializing in civil law. We help you resolve legal disputes with confidence, clarity, and professional support.
SEO_SERVICIOS_LEGALES_TITLE: Servicios Legales | Asesoramiento Jurídico Especializado | Asancus Legal
SEO_SERVICIOS_LEGALES_DESCRIPTION: Descubre nuestros servicios legales especializados en derecho civil y mercantil. En Asesoramiento Legal e Internacional te ofrecemos soluciones jurídicas personalizadas para particulares y empresas.
SEO_SERVICIOS_FISCALES_TITLE: Servicios Tributarios | Defensa Tributaria y Planificación Fiscal Estratégica | Asancus Legal
SEO_SERVICIOS_FISCALES_DESCRIPTION: Expertos en asesoría y defensa fiscal. Representamos a particulares y empresas en inspecciones tributarias, recursos contenciosos y planificación fiscal eficiente a nivel nacional e internacional.

title: Conflicto tributario
Operaciones de M&A
Empresa familiar
description:
Destinado a resolver disputas o desacuerdos entre el contribuyente y la administración tributaria en relación con la interpretación, aplicación o cumplimiento de las normas fiscales o tributarias.

Destinado principalmente en:

.- Inspecciones tributarias.
.- Reclamaciones Económico Administrativos.
.- Recursos contenciosos.
.- Derivaciones de responsabilidad.

Asesoramiento especializado en ayudar a las empresas a llevar a cabo transacciones estratégicas como fusiones, adquisiciones, ventas o inversiones, con el fin de definir una estrategia de M&A que se ajuste a sus objetivos y necesidades. Experiencia con empresas nacionales e internacionales.

Asesoramiento jurídico y fiscal en todas las etapas de la empresa familiar, consistente en:

.- Planificación. 
.- Asesoramiento Fiscal. 
.- Protocolos familiares. 
.- Sucesión empresarial.
